attributes.action: Stop the proposed plans to cut funding for universities in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We appose any forms of university funding cuts in England.
Higher Education Students are the FUTURE of the country and are the driving force behind the FUTURE economy.
Depriving students from learning and expanding thier knowledge (for the good of the Country) is unfair and unjust.
Further to this, students currently in higher education should not suffer from cuts in university funding which WILL result in a lesser quality of teaching and lower degree results.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to stop the proposed plans to cut funding for universities in England.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=SayNoToCuts


Her Majesty's Government
